title: A Gumby adventure
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: Relive your favourite Gumby moments in this compilation tape as Gumby and Pokey are involved in an assortment of adventures and mishaps. Episodes include; WITTY WITCH, Gumby and Pokey are kidnapped by a helicopter-flying witch; HOT ROD GRANNY, an elderly lady takes Gumby's car for a spin after she mistakes it for hers after breaking her glasses; IN A FIX, there mischief afoot among Gumby and Pokey's toys and a couple of strange birds; KING FOR A DAY, Gumby saves the kingdom of Ott by jousting; THE GROOBEE, Gumby rides a giant bee on an animal hunt; GOPHER TROUBLE, a chemist gopher alters the appearance of corn plants into giant corn ears; RAIN FOR ROO, Gumby shows King Ott how to make rain for his dry kingdom; CHICKEN FEED, Gumby is stuck with a chicken the size of a house; THE ZOOPS, Gumby is sold a magic potion that turns watermelons into strange animals that cry "zoop".
